availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Maria Anna Eidson Taylor (Ohio County, Kentucky, resident and slaveholder.)

body.p: Ohio County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Married to Godfrey Taylor in Ohio County on May 5, 1852. Mother of Sallie H. Taylor, Jennie Taylor, and Lucie Taylor. Owned fourteen enslaved persons in Ohio County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Hartford, p. 789.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Hartford, p. 157A.
"Mary Ann Eidson Griffin (1833-1890)," Find A Grave, Memorial #32174805, accessed June 7, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/32174805.
